job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: incloudcounsel is seeking a ltstronggtmachine learning engineerltstronggt to help our rapidly growing team deliver automatic negotiation with computable contracts if you are a data or ml professional looking for a company that is financiallyhealthy rapidly scaling and impacting the trajectory of an industry we would love to get to know youltbrgtltbrgtincloudcounsel is an industry leader in modernizing routine legal processes our global team works with many of the worlds leading companies to offer robust endtoend contract processing and obligation management solutions that combine cutting edge technology deep industry expertise and a worldclass roster of legal professionalsltbrgtltbrgtthe machine learning engineer will report directly to our ltstronggtdirector of york denver philadelphia miami chicago ltstronggtorltstronggt mexico cityltstronggtltbrgtltulgtltligtuntil further notice all incloudcounsel employees are working remotely from this anatomy to develop legal intelligence and automationltligtltligttrain and optimize machine learning models using a variety of tools and frameworksltligtltligtbuild tools and frameworks to train store serve and analyze machine learning models ltligtltligtwork with our data infrastructure team to help build and maintain data systems we run on heroku and awsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtbasic qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtexperience years of industry work experienceltligtltligtrelevant programming experience excellent knowledge of python for data analysis data processing and server programming we use numpy pandas spacy nltk scikitlearn pytorch tensorflow keras and many other libraries this is our preferred tech stack but if you have comparable experience in a different stack thats fine tooltligtltligtapplied science skills relevant experience with machine learning natural language processing neural networks computational linguistics knowledge graphs or taxonomiesltligtltligtdomain expertise experience with text classification keyphrase extraction question answering word embeddings representation learning neural machine translation language modeling text summarization text generation andor knowledge graphs is a plusltligtltligtproficiency with data technology strong skill set and experience using modern data technologies sql snowflake postgres spark dask pandasltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtabout the team ltstronggtwere all about freedom incloudcounsel is on a mission to free companies from outdated legal musicians dancers photographers sailors surfers world travelers home flippers and animal lovers and our freedom inspires us to free
